price: Wọ́n máa ń sun oorun díẹ̀ nínú òru.
arabic: كَانُواْ قَلِيلٗا مِّنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ مَا يَهۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: kānū qalīlan mina al-layli mā yahjaʿūna
